
```{r test covariates, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
pheno = read.table("/sc/hydra/projects/pd-omics/mynd/analyses/analysis_9_19_19/mynd_metadata_9_19_19.txt", header = T, row.names = 1, check.names = F)
pheno$rna_batch = as.factor(pheno$rna_batch)
pheno$season = as.factor(pheno$season)

counts = read.table("/sc/hydra/projects/pd-omics/mynd/analyses/analysis_9_19_19/mynd.counts.txt", header = TRUE, check.names = FALSE)
identical(rownames(pheno), colnames(counts))
x <- DGEList(counts=counts, samples=pheno)
cpm = cpm(x)

pheno$status <- relevel(pheno$status, ref="Control")
#pheno$gba <- relevel(pheno$gba, ref='N')
#pheno$lrrk2 <- relevel(pheno$lrrk2, ref = 'N')

keep.exp = rowSums(cpm > 1) >= 0.3*ncol(x) #Filtering
x = x[keep.exp,]
x = calcNormFactors(x, method = "TMM") #normalized counts with TMM

x = voom(x)
#Test Fit of different designs with limma
design_list <- 
  list( simple = model.matrix(~ status, data = pheno),
        #flowcell = model.matrix( ~ status + rna_batch, data = pheno),
        age = model.matrix(~ status + age, data = pheno),
        pct_use = model.matrix(~status + PCT_USABLE_BASES, data = pheno),
        rin = model.matrix( ~ status + rin_value, data = pheno),
        gender = model.matrix( ~ status + gender, data = pheno),
        des_1 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds1 + mds2 + mds3 + mds4 + rna_batch + gender + PCT_USABLE_BASES + rin_value + age, data = pheno ),
        des_1mds2 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds1 + mds2 + rna_batch + gender + PCT_USABLE_BASES + rin_value + age, data = pheno ),
	mds1 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds1, data = pheno ),
        mds2 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds2, data = pheno ),
        mds3 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds3, data = pheno ),
        mds4 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds4, data = pheno ),
	des_1 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds1 + mds2 + mds3 + mds4 + rna_batch + gender + rin_value + age, data = pheno ),        
	des_2mds2 = model.matrix( ~ status + mds1 + mds2 + rna_batch + gender + rin_value + age,  data = pheno )
  )

model_select <- selectModel(x, designlist = design_list, criterion = "bic")

# This gives the number of genes that have the best BIC
table(model_select$pref) %>% knitr::kable()
```
